title: Social Constructivist-Based University Language Virtual Distance Learning Experience Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Language education environment using a learning management system (LMS) and synchronous/asynchronous interaction tools, emphasizing peer collaboration and feedback support

learning_goals: Learners improve their ability to perform linguistic interactions across diverse digital platforms
Learners achieve mathematical problem-solving skills with over 80% accuracy through collaboration with peers and instructors
Learners improve language expression abilities by three or more levels using feedback systems provided in mobile environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
